column1: '''Agaldor''' was the chieftain of a people living in the northwest of [[Middle-earth]].<ref>{{LR

column2: man]] living among the exiled people in Middle-earth. He was the chief of a people on the edge of the [[Belegaer
column3: Western Sea]] and a seer who often walked along the beaches and coastlines. He foresaw among other things, the arrival of the [[Númenóreans]] and the redemption of mankind ahead. Agaldor was later killed by the Númenóreans who took control of the lands.<ref>{{LR
